EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.TYFA - Chicago 3-31-16
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to see you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/chicago]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending the Chicago Cloud Native Workshop. We would love to hear feedback from you for future workshop improvements. Please fill out the short survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/16T9R3IGXBZHoE_vmXcf7VN68WheqYmtH91Au0asaeT4/prefill]]> and let us know your thoughts.
In addition, you can find all the lab materials on the github repository: https://github.com/jigsheth57/Cloud-Native-Workshop
As a next step, you can sign up for a free 60 day trial membership with Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/&utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=CNW-ChicagoQ116]]> or install the PCF (Pivotal Cloud Foundry) Dev version locally. For PCF-Dev you will need to install the latest Vagrant & Virtualbox. The required software installs are available on the flash drive that was handed out during the workshop.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us directly.
Sincerely,
Jignesh Sheth email: jsheth@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jsheth@pivotal.io]]>
Peter Sullivan email: pesullivan@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pesullivan@pivotal.io]]>
Jim Basler email: jbasler@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jbasler@pivotal.io]]>
Chris Johnson email: chjohnson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:chjohnson@pivotal.io]]>
